data.message: how does it not violate your terms letting a live shoot video of a man dieing stand on facebook, boy you screwed up big..

replies.message: Hi Lee. If you believe a post is violating our Community Standards, you can report it by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2bGoqxw. -Rey
it was reported and you said it did not violate your terms. so its fine watching a man bungie to his death live .. sick
Facebook how come you guys still won't let us know why that profile pretending to be my husband is still up?? I'm pretty sure it is illegal to pretend to be a soldier!!!!
it dont violate their terms lol

Their terms are all screwed up since they dont even abide by their terms, I think it's time Facebook needs an over haul, I don't think actual people run Facebook and it's an automatic response but they never give me an answer as to why this jerk is pretending to be my husband stole pictures of our kids and is scamming women how any of that is legal and doesn't violate community standards is beyond me lol
better be careful we might get the facebook cops on us next.
